ingredients.ingredient: 2 plantains, ends cut off and peels removed
4 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into 1/3-inch slices

cookingTips: Use ripe plantains for easier peeling and better flavor
Slice plantains lengthwise and create pockets for cheese insertion
Mozzarella will melt evenly if sliced to uniform thickness
